comments.body: It's tempting to do the PEP 508 stuff in a separate PR, just to give it a little more visibility. This looks harmless, but it might be good to seed discussion about any further PEP508 changes

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@[build-system]
# Minimum requirements for the build system to execute.
requires = ["setuptools", "wheel", "cython"]  # PEP 508 specification

comments.body: this gives us a live view of the release note, nice!

ahh, except it doesn't. CircleCI says
```
/home/circleci/repo/doc/source/release/{version}-notes.rst: WARNING: document isn't included in any toctree
```
Yeah, the `single_file` option is opposit to what I thought :), I think hawkowl changed it from my PR, so it created the wrong file. It will create a live view of course.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@    # the name is hardcoded. Use "--version 1.18.0" to set the version
    single_file = true
    filename = "doc/source/release/{version}-notes.rst"
    directory = "doc/release/upcoming_changes/"
    issue_format = "`gh-{issue} <https://github.com/numpy/numpy/pull/{issue}>`__"
